items.title: MEng Engineering Science @ Univerity of Oxford
Publication @ MIDL 2023
items.time: April 2023, first author of a short paper
items.description: Publication of my short paper: High-Fidelity Image Synthesis from Pulmonary Nodule Lesion Maps using Semantic Diffusion Model. Successfully made to the Medical Imaging with Deep Learning 2023 Conference. This short paper is also Part I of my final year individual project at Imperial.
